name: Demian Saga
summary:
Demian Saga is a collectible RPG with a heavy focus on characters. The game features gorgeous character art, flashy cut scenes, and cute 3D models done in a chibi art style.

The level-charing system is designed to help characters quickly level up, while the combat system requires players to plan which group of heroes from their pirate crew will engage in battle.

Massive real-time PvP content that allows up to 200 players from four unions (guilds) is also in the works and scheduled to release when the game launches.
